title: BRIEF-Centenera Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up To $3M
text: March 27, 2018 / 1:23 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Centenera Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up To $3M Reuters Staff March 27 (Reuters) - Centenera Mining Corp: * CENTENERA ANNOUNCES NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UP TO $3M * CENTENERA MINING CORP - NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UP TO 16.7 MILLION UNITS PRICED AT $0.18 PER UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
